casebody.data:
Anthony HORBAL and HERC Management Services, LLC, Petitioners
v.
GIANT EAGLE, INC., Giant Eagle of Delaware Inc., Daniel Shapira, David Shapira, and Laura Karet, Respondents No. 71 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. August 21, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 21st day of August, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
